title: Average ticket price Golden State Warriors ( NBA ) games 2015/16
yAxis: Average ticket price in U.S. dollars
summary: In general Average ticket price in U.S. dollars has rose over the Year.
Average ticket price in U.S. dollars is slightly increasing from 2013/14 to 2014/15.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2013/14 and 2014/15.
The highest Average ticket price in U.S. dollars, of value 47.38 was reached at Year 2014/15
Minimum Average ticket price in U.S. dollars about 44.27 was reached at Year 2013/14
